title: How DockHub Uno Works
subtitle: Three simple steps to modernize your boat lift

steps.title: Quick Install
steps.description: Connect 3 wires to your existing lift motor. No tools needed for setup. Takes minutes, not hours.

steps.title: Download App
steps.description: Free app for iPhone and Android. Connect via Bluetooth in seconds. No complex pairing process.

steps.title: Take Control
steps.description: Operate from anywhere. Set digital limits with one button press. Share access instantly.
